articles.title: White House backs Senate bill to boost US ability to ban TikTok - Reuters
articles.description: The White House backed legislation introduced on Tuesday by a dozen senators to give the administration new powers to ban Chinese-owned video app TikTok and other foreign-based technologies if they pose national security threats.
articles.content: WASHINGTON, March 7 (Reuters) - The White House backed legislation introduced on Tuesday by a dozen senators to give the administration new powers to ban Chinese-owned video app TikTok and other fore… [+4414 chars]

articles.title: Bumblebees Learn To Solve Puzzles by Watching Other Bees - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A new study has shown that bumblebees pick up new “trends” in their behavior by watching and learning from other bees, and that one form of behavior can spread rapidly through a colony even when a different version gets discovered. The research, led by Queen …
articles.content: A new study published in PLOS Biology shows that bumblebees can learn new behavior by watching and imitating other bees, and that this behavior can quickly spread throughout a colony. The research su… [+2688 chars]

Meta is reportedly planning thousands of additional layoffs as soon as this week, in what would be another major downsizing for one of the Bay Areas biggest employers.Meta declined to comment.
